WorkItem.ClosedComment: Poster clearly not wanting to be helped. No point in leaving an open issue.
WorkItem.Description: Would love to be able to point Rawr at my Bagnon/Combuctor SV's to tell it what stuff I have than all this silly point-click-type-point-click-type-knees-bent-running-around routine.
WorkItem.Summary: RFE: Import bag from Inventory addons

Comments.Message:
Yeah, can only advertise for character profiler, it's really a fantastic addon to speed up item availability for your character in rawr.
If it wasn't for blizzard implementing the item rack thingy, I'd have coded an 'export to ItemRack.lua' function *giggle*

I think what your comments are trying to say - behind the sad attempt at snide remarks - is 'hey we already do it via character profiler'. QED. That you can't grok the simple implications of my request beyond your own initial snobbery is not my fault.

/me goes and installs a solo purpose addon.
...what? Sad attempts? Snide remarks? Snobbery? Wtf are you talking about? You're crazy.
